title: Family-Friendly Southampton Stay with Restaurant & Complimentary Breakfast
description: Get ready to zip away for fun with a family-friendly stay at Holiday Inn Express Southampton - West , an IHG Hotel. Located just off the M271 and M27 motorways, the hotel provides easy access to the city's ports and train station and attractions, including Paulton’s Park and the New Forest Wildlife Park. Fuel up for days full of fun with a hot buffet breakfast, and at the end of the day, return to the hotel’s lounge to treat the whole family to a delicious dinner.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Southampton - West, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Adanac Park, Redbridge Lane, Nursling, Southampton, SO16 0YP, United Kingdom
